name: Wildbus
detailed_description:
Game introduction
Take the wheel of the Wildbus and unleash the fun! Pave your way to happiness by blasting and punching hordes of crazy mutant scum with your modded bus. Pick up weird passengers and smack the world up with their abilities. No reverse gear, only full throttle forward.

Background story
The Great Devastation was a massive war between huge enterprises and the government that lasted for more than a decade. When the war ended, Arrakis became shrouded in the dark clouds of despair as mutant monsters and bandits rose from the darkness to control the world, but people who believe in the light continue to drive armed buses in the wilderness in search of the Promised Land of Light filled with the ultimate happiness...

Game features
● Retro cartoon style
● Collect different weapons to carry out group attacks!

● Passengers are invited to board the bus to get special abilities!

● 8 levels with more than 70 NPCs and 60 different enemies!

● There are tons of Easter eggs hidden in the game for you to discover!
● Incidents, ruins, enemies... Triumph over obstacles, and move towards the Land of Light!

Game Manual:https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/818360/manuals/en.pdf
